snippet.title: GoldenEye with Mario Characters v3 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Revamped & New Models, Restored Beta Content, Recreated Content, and New Content. To celebrate GoldenEye's 25th Anniversary, I basically Remade GoldenEye with Mario Characters.

A ton of changes and improvements were made to the mod but the video only highlights some of them, read the Changelog text files for more details. Does contain Spoilers for some cool things.

Download now includes all previous versions of the Mod for personal preferences or speedrunning as each major Update changed a lot of things throughout the game.

Download Links:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sxqNSrNbsiX4HKNZY-W2Rl6rLCq1simm/view
https://www.moddb.com/mods/goldeneye-with-mario-characters
http://n64vault.com/ge-for-fun:goldeneye-with-mario-characters

Credit & Thanks to @Graslu00 Carnivorous, Sogun, @subdrag, @WreckSeven, Zoinkity and @AlDavisMusic, check out the Readme text file & Game's Credits for more info.

2019 Luigi Custom Model for Super Mario 64 by @Cjes and @CyberTanuki with Special Thanks to @Dudaw, @Flotonic, and @subdrag.

Music Used:

Heartbeat (GoldenEye 007 Retro HD+)
Silo (Sole Signal) (GoldenEye: Source OST)

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/StupidMarioFan1
